title: new starter items are so strong, it's not a choice, Riot might as well delete Doran items now..
body:
Cull is a new starter item, how is adding a item so much better than the old one, a choice?

you lose 80 points of hp and a bit of vamp/damage? sure, but after 100 cs you get a one time huge boost of gold (300). so why the hell would anyone in their right mind buy Doran blade?.

it's just makes me angry that we finally get new choices, and they are so strong old items are plain shit now
